title: Riot, what if evelynn players could see the enemies champions blind spots (passive idea)
body:
So this image below can show you an in game indicator (only for evelynn to see) of the enemies blind spots (the white triangle behind ashe) :

http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/closopes/eve_zps31230a3d.png

*

> PASSIVE: When out of combat for 6 seconds, Evelynn enters stealth, only being able to be seen by **enemy champions facing her **within 700 range  or true sight. While stealthed, Evelynn regenerates 2% of her missing mana every second and ignores unit collision.

today i thought about this: what if evelinn could not be seen, behind champions while stealthed.
From one side, it kinda makes sence. This will increase her early game pressure, thanks to her passive stealth that makes her ganks a little easier and more strategic in the point of view that you've got to pay attention to your enemy monevents. Now, with this you can get closer to your enemies  from behind without being seen, but also ofc you can make your teammates snowball hard in some cases and make her enemies spend their gold on pink wards (that everyone in the game should buy).

*the indicator is just a example of what i wanted to say: basically evelynn can't be detected while stealthed near and behind an enemy champion.
 
(the triangle or cone behind the enemy could be in 80º,  just like in cassiopeia ultimate indicator, memember this is just an idea and you can tell me what you think).

and remember this: 
"There is little mystery about her to me - she is the ultimate predator."
― {{champion:24}}  Jax

now your gona say that he can turn around... ok but at that time she is already there nothing he can do, while with her live server passive it's that yes you can se her coming in to you and you can flash and get out.

just thing of shaco: if hes enemy is face to face with him, there it goes his bonus damage. and shaco's passive allows him to have different playstyle: to apear from behind and deal a huge damage just by going there invisible. while with this passive eve could pool this playstyle out **but **in another way XD She doesn't even have slow early pre 6 only her stealth and she is squishy.

i mean... can you understand the people that kinda like this passive?

I can understand why it would be interesting, but I don't agree. You mentioned Shaco, because he comes in the same way. Except, Shaco's invisibility has a set time limit and costs mana. With her current passive you can see her coming and escape. With this, **it would be impossible to see her coming without getting lucky**. I just feel a permanent invisibility that already ignores wards and can only be seen by facing her direction is beyond broken. In a fight, you are facing your enemy more than 90% of the time, which makes it too easy for her to sneak up on you. There would be no counterplay other than pink wards, and counterplay through items is not true counterplay.
